relation.text: were dictated in perfect equity , since they referrd
opened my busineſs with Mr. Holman who has been with me two days
gave him this short answer , Sir you have now
put an abrupt conclusion to our conference & I am happy in the thought all connexion between us is now
remain My dear Sir Your faithful & obliged humble Servt . Frederick Hamilton N o . 1 Brock St . Bath . June 24
